thread.title: Paris attacks suspect faces Belgian trial over Brussels shoot-out

title: Paris attacks suspect faces Belgian trial over Brussels shoot-out
text:
Paris attacks suspect faces Belgian trial over Brussels shoot-out 8:55am EST - 00:46 
Salah Abdeslam, the prime surviving suspect from the 2015 Paris attacks, tells the judge to ''do as you want with me'' at the start of his trial over the 2016 Brussels shoot-out. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Salah Abdeslam, the prime surviving suspect from the 2015 Paris attacks, tells the judge to "do as you want with me" at the start of his trial over the 2016 Brussels shoot-out. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2nGxeGy
